Text.Page:
I'm ashamed to ask, particularly while things are so dire, but I need your help. My dog, Ohdi, ran off. The kids told me he headed towards Berzerad Cemetery. I wouldn't ask just for myself. The other residents draw great comfort from Ohdi.

Take this bag. It's got a treat Esedran cooked up for me. Give it to Ohdi and he'll hop right in the bag. Please?

Corann's pet? Blasted dog gets into more trouble than a drunken thief.

Yes, now that you mention it, I think I did see him scampering up the hill. {@LinkCreature:203#1025#Ohdi} really likes that cemetery.
(Ohdi's paws are covered in dirt and quite a few new holes dot the ground. He looks up at you with undisguised joy and wags his tail.)
<PCNAME>, I owe you a great deal. Thank you for rescuing Ohdi. I don't know what I, er, the town would do.
